channel.title: CVE Feed for OrchardCore -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OrchardCore -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-25966|2024-08-03T20:19:19.729Z -- orchardcore -- users
item.description: In “Orchard core CMS” application, versions 1.0.0-beta1-3383 to 1.0.0 are vulnerable to an improper session termination after password change. When a password has been changed by the user or by an administrator, a user that was already logged in, will still have access to the application even after the password was changed.

item.title: CVE-2022-32173|2024-08-03T07:32:56.015Z -- orchardcore -- orchardcore
item.description: In OrchardCore rc1-11259 to v1.2.2 vulnerable to HTML injection, allow an authenticated user with an editor security role to inject a persistent HTML modal dialog component into the dashboard that will affect admin users.
